name: ELEM_VAL_PREV
description: Contains information about previous values and comments for a SmartData element value.

columns.name: HLV_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the value record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PREV_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: Instant of edit of previous smartdata element value or comment

columns.name: PREV_USERS
columns.description: previous user to set value or comment

columns.name: PREV_SRC_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note that the previous value is attached to.

columns.name: PREV_NOTE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The status of the previous note.

columns.name: PREV_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The previous UTC instants at which this SDE was documented

columns.name: PREV_VALUE_INVLD_YN
columns.description: Indicate a previous value to be invalid.
